original_text: And the afflicted people thou wilt save: but thine eyes are upon the haughty, that thou mayest bring them down.
korean_text: 주께서 곤고한 백성은 구원하시고 교만한 자를 살피사 낮추시리이다

sentences.original_text: but thine eyes are upon haughty,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주의 눈은 교만한 자에게 있으며

sentences.original_text: that thou mayest bring them down.
